SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: All personnel, evacuation order has been confirmed. Proceed to your designated vehicles... A man flushes people by. The sign on the building reads: JOINT DARK ENERGY MISSION; WESTERN DIVISION; PROJECT PEGASUS, NASA SPACE RADIATION FACILITY, S.H.I.E.L.D

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: ...for all campus evacuation.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: How bad is it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: That’s the problem, sir. We don’t know. 5

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: ...energy surge from the Tesseract four hours ago.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: NASA didn’t authorize Selvig could go to test B.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: He wasn’t testing it. He wasn’t even in the room. Spontaneous event.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: It just turned itself on?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Where are the energy levels now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Climbing. When Selvig couldn’t shut it down we ordered evac.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: How long to get everyone out?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Campus should be clear in the next half hour.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Do better. Fury and Hill continue on as Coulson turns around and heads the other way. 7

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, evacuation may be futile.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: We should tell them to go back to sleep?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: If we can’t control the Tesseract’s energy there may not be a minimum safe distance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I need you to make sure the Phase Two prototypes are shipped out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, is that really a priority right now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Until such time as the world ends we will act as though it intends to spin on. Clear out the tech below. Every piece of Phase Two on a truck and gone. /LINE>

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, Sir. (to guards) With me. Fury enters the Tesseract room. 8

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Talk to me, Doctor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Director.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Is there anything we know for certain?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: The Tesseract is misbehaving.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Is that supposed to be funny?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: No, it’s not funny at all. The Tesseract is not only active, she’s misbehaving.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: How soon can you pull the plug?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: She’s an energy source. We turn off the power, she turns it back on. If she reaches peak level-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: We prepared for this, Doctor. Harnessing energy from space.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: We don’t have the harness. My calculations are far from complete. She’s throwing off interference, radiation. Nothing harmful, low levels of Gamma radiation. /LINE>

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: That can be harmful. Where’s agent Barton?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: The hawk? Up in his nest, as usual. CLINT BARTON, also known as HAWKEYE, is on a balcony, observing the lab.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Barton’s radio) Agent Barton. Report. Barton zip-lines down a rope. FURY (V.O) (sturn) I gave you this detail so you could keep a close eye on things. Fury and Barton walk together toward the Tesseract machine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I see better from a distance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Have you seen anything that might set this thing off? A NASA SCIENTIST calls for Selvig.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NASA SCIENTIST
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor! It’s spiking again. Barton and Fury step onto the platform, in front of the Tesseract machine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: No one’s come and gone. And Selvig’s clean. No contacts, no IM. If there’s any tampering, sir, it wasn’t this end. While Barton is talking Selvig walks over to the computer where the NASA SCIENTIST is. He looks concerned and worried.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (a little confused) At this end?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. The Cube is a doorway to the other end of space, right? Doors open from both sides. The Cube sparks.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: What’s that? It sparks again. 9

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (to Loki) Sir, please put down the spear! Loki looks at his scepter then fires a stream on blue light from it. Barton pushes Fury out the way. The guards open fire. Loki jumps at them, firing more energy and fighting. Shooting scientists and agents. Barton moves towards him but Loki grabs his arm.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You have heart.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: (to Fury, turning around) Please don’t. I still need that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: This doesn’t have to get any messier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Of course it does. I’ve come too far for anything else. I am Loki, of Asgard. And I am burdened with glorious purpose. Selvig, checking the pulse of NASA SCIENTIST, hears and approaches.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Loki, brother of Thor?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: We have no quarrel with your people.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: An ant has no quarrel with a boot.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: You planning to step on us?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I come with glad tidings, of a world made free.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Free from what?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Freedom. Freedom is life’s great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart- Loki turns and places the spear tip on Selvig’s chest. -you will know peace. Barton sees the Tesseract portal cloud, brewing and moves to Loki.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, you say peace. I kinda think you mean the other thing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (to Loki) Sir, Director Fury is stalling. This place is about to blow and drop a hundred feet of rock on us. He means to bury us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Like the pharaohs of old.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: He’s right. The portal is collapsing in on itself. We’ve got maybe two minutes before this goes critical.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Well then. Barton quickly draws his gun and shoots Fury, who drops the case. Barton picks up as he, Loki, Selvig and another agent leave the room. 12

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: We need this vehicles.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (seeing Loki) Who’s that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Didn’t tell me. The roof is slowly crumbling. Loki gets onto a SHIELD pickup truck. Selvig enters the passenger seat, holding the case.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Hill’s radio) Hill! 9. 13

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into his radio) Do you copy? 14

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Hill’s radio) Barton...has turned. Barton pulls his gun and fires at Hill, who rolls behind the back room wall and returns fire. Barton enters the driver’s seat of the pickup and drives off with Loki is in the bed. 15

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) Get the Tesseract. Shut them down. 16

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (to guards) Let’s just go. No-no-no! Leave it, leave it. GO! 10. 20

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) We’re clear upstairs, sir... 22

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (over Fury’s radio) Director. BEGIN INTERCUT: FURY / TRUCK CANOPY / UNDERGROUND TUNNEL AGENT COULSON (CONT’D) (into radio) Director Fury, do you copy?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) The Tesseract is with a hostile force. I have men down. Hill?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio; getting out of crushed jeep) A lot of men still under. Don’t know how many survivors.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Hill’s radio) Sound a general call. I want every living soul...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) ...not working rescue looking for that briefcase.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) Roger that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into radio) Coulson, get back to base.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Coulson’s radio) This is a level seven.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Hill’s radio) As of right now...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into his radio) We are at war.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (into his radio) What do we do? Fury thinks, as the CAMERA GOES TIGHT on him. TITLE CARD: Marvel’s THE AVENGERS 30

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) This isn’t how I wanted this evening to go.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) I know how you wanted this evening. Believe me this is better.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) Who are you working for? Lermentov, yes? TALL THUG walks over to Natasha and leans the chair over a pit. She becomes scared.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) I thought General Solohob is in charge of the export business.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) Solohob. A bagman, a front. Your outdated information betrays you. The famous Black Widow is just another pretty face.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) You really think I’m pretty? TALL THUG grabs her jaw and forces it open as Luchkov walks to the table behind him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian) Tell Lermentov we don’t need him to move the tanks. Tell him he is out. Well... Luchkov picks up a tool of the table and plays with it. ...You may have to write it. Suddenly a phone rings. WEASELLY THUG answers his phone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WEASELLY THUG
SPEECH.LINE: It’s for her. Luchkov takes the phone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian; into cell) You listen carefully- AGENT COULSON (V.O) (over the cell) You’re at 1- 14 Silensky Plaza, 3rd floor. We have an F-22 exactly eight miles out. Put the woman on the phone or I will blow up the block before you can make the lobby.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) Are you kidding? I’m working.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (over the cell) This takes precedence.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) I’m in the middle of an interrogation, and this moron is giving me everything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GEORGI LUCHKOV
SPEECH.LINE: (to Tall Thug) I not- give everything. Natasha gives Luchkov a look. BEGIN INTERCUT: COULSON / NATASHA

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) Look, you can’t pull me out of this right now.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) Natasha...Barton’s been compromised.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) Let me put you on hold. Luchkov moves in for the cell phone. Natasha kicks him between the legs and headbutts him. WEASELLY THUG swings his fist at her and she kicks him back. TALL THUG runs up and she spins around -- and the chair legs hit him. WEASELLY THUG jumps to his feet. Natasha rolls with the chair and drops the legs on his feet. She whips her head at him and hits him in the nose then trips him. As she fights the TALL THUG, Coulson listens to the fight over the phone. He stands quiet -- waiting as he hears the groaning, kicking, and punching.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (over cell) We don’t know.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: But he’s alive?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (into phone) We think so. Coulson is looking at a screen that’s playing a video of Hawkeye & Black Widow in Budapest. We’ll brief you on everything when you get back. Coulson is handed a folder. He walks down some stairs as he talks. But first, we need you to talk to the big guy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into cell) Coulson, you know that Stark trusts me about as far as he can throw me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Oh I’ve got Stark! You get the big guy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: END INTERCUT
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha stops in her tracks, shocked at what Coulson has just said.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (in Russian; quietly) My God. 31

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CALCUTTA WOMAN
SPEECH.LINE: (in Hindi) Who are you? Get out! There is sickness here!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG GIRL
SPEECH.LINE: (very fast in Hindi) Are you the doctor? I need a doctor. My father. My father’s not waking up! He has a fever and he’s moaning but his eyes won’t open. Banner hears and moves over to the YOUNG GIRL. He kneels before her.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (in Hindi) Slow down.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG GIRL
SPEECH.LINE: (in Hindi) My father-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (in Hindi) Like them? Banner points to the people in the house that are sick. YOUNG GIRL nods and holds up a wad of cash.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG GIRL
SPEECH.LINE: (in Hindi; emotion) Please! 17. 32

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (quietly to himself) Should have got paid upfront Banner.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You know, for a man who’s supposed to be... Natasha reveals herself to Banner from behind a curtain. NATASHA (CONT’D) ...avoiding stress, you picked a hell of a place to settle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (putting his bag down) Avoiding stress isn’t the secret.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Then what is it? Yoga?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: And you brought me to the end of the city. Smart. (peeping through the window) I- uh- I assume the whole place is surrounded. Natasha removes her scarf.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Just you and me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: And your actress buddy? She a spy too, they start that wrong?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (a little nervous) I did.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Who are you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha Romanoff.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Are you here to kill me, Ms Romanoff? ’Cause that’s not going to work out for everyone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: No, no. Of course not. I’m here on behalf of SHIELD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (a little mad) SHIELD. How’d they find me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We never lost you, Doctor. We’ve kept our distance, even helped keep some other interested parties off your scent.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Nick Fury seems to trust you. But now we need you to come in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: What if I say no?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (seductive, sturn, smiling) I’ll persuade you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (a little sad and reluctant) And what if the- Other Guy says no?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You’ve been more than a year without an incident. I don’t think you want to break that streak. Banner pushes at an old wooden cradle, it creaks.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I don’t every time get what I want.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor, we’re facing a potential global catastrophe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (chuckles) Oh those I actively try to avoid.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: This (takes a seat) is the Tesseract. Natasha slides a cell phone along the table. On it is an image of the Tesseract. It has the potential energy to wipe out the planet. Banner puts on his glasses, approaches and picks up the touch screen cell phone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: What does Fury want me to do? Swallow it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: He wants you to find it. It’s been taken. It emits a Gamma signature that’s too weak for us to trace. No one knows Gamma radiation like you do. If there was, that’s where I’d be.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: So Fury isn’t after the monster?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Not that he’s told me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: And he tells you everything?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Talk to Fury, he needs you on this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (immediate response) He needs me in a cage?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: No one’s going to put you in a-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: STOP LYING TO ME! Banner yells, crashing his hands down on the table. Natasha stands, pulling a gun and aims at him. He draws back, smiling. I’m sorry. That was mean. (smiles) I just wanted to see what you’d do. Natasha stares at him, a little teary, scared out of her mind. Why don’t we do this the easy way where you don’t use that and the- Other Guy doesn’t make a mess? Okay?....Natasha. Natasha lowers her weapon and speaks into an earpiece.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (quietly into her earpiece) Stand down. We’re good here. The horde of armed guards surrounding the shack lower their weapons.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Just you and me? Natasha realizes he knows and stands silent. 34

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: This is out of line, Director. You’re dealing with forces you can’t control.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: You ever been in a war, councilman? In a fire fight? Did you feel an over abundance of control?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: You’re saying that this Asgard is declaring war on our planet?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Not Asgard, Loki.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILWOMAN
SPEECH.LINE: He can’t be working alone. What about the other one, his brother?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Our intelligence says Thor is not a hostile. But he’s worlds away and we can’t depend on him to help either. It’s up to us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: Which is why you should be focusing on Phase Two, it was designed for exactly this purpose.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Phase Two isn’t ready; our enemy is. We need a response team.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: The Avengers Initiative was shut down.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: This isn’t about the Avengers.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: We’re running the world’s greatest covert security network and you’re gonna leave the fate of the human race to a handful of freaks.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not leaving anything to anyone. We need a response team. These people may be isolated, unbalanced even, but I believe, with the right push, they can be exactly what we need.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILWOMAN
SPEECH.LINE: You believe!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: War isn’t won by sentiment, Director.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: No, It’s won by soldiers. 22. 35

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (across the room) Trouble sleeping?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (hitting the bag) Slept for seventy years, Sir. I think I’ve had my fill. Fury slowly approaches Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Then you should be out, celebrating, seeing the world.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: When I went under, the world was at war. I wake up- they say we won. They didn’t say what we lost.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve made some mistakes along the way, some very recently.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (removing hand wrap) You here with a mission, Sir?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I am.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (removing other hand wrap) Trying to get me back in the world?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Trying to save it. Fury hands Steve a folder with information on the Tesseract in it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: HYDRA’s secret weapon.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Howard Stark fished that out of the ocean when he was looking for you. He thought what we think. The Tesseract could be the key to unlimited sustainable energy. That’s something the world sorely needs.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Who took it from you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: He’s called Loki. He’s- not from around here. There’s a lot we’ll have to bring you up to speed on if you’re in. The world has gotten even stranger than you already know.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: At this point I doubt anything would surprise me. Steve gets up, grabs his duffel bag, and another punching bag while Fury is talking.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Ten bucks says you’re wrong. There’s a debriefing packet waiting for you back at your apartment. Is there anything you can tell us about the Tesseract that we ought to know now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You should have left it in the ocean. Steve exits. 36

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Good to go on this end. The rest is up to you. PEPPER (V.O) (over Iron Man headset) You disconnected the transmission lines? Are we off the grid? INSIDE IRON MAN HEADSET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (into headset) Stark Tower’s about to become a beacon of self-sustaining clean energy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: (on Iron Man HUD display) Well, assuming the arc reactor takes over and it actually works. 37

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (into headset) ...but with more- me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: (on Iron Man HUD display) We’ve got to go wider on the public awareness campaign. You need to do some press. Iron Man flies over a overpass & up the side of Stark Tower. PEPPER (V.O) (over Iron Man headset) I’m in DC tomorrow. I’m working on the zoning for the next three buildings. TONY (V.O) (over Iron Man headset) Pepper, you’re killing me at the moment. Remember, enjoy the moment. 39

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, Agent Coulson of SHIELD is on the line.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not in. I’m actually out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, I’m afraid he’s insisting.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Grow a spine, JARVIS. I got a date. 26. 40

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Levels are holding steady- I think. Tony approaches Pepper.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Of course they are, I was directly involved. Which leads me to my next question. How does it feel to be a genius? Tony turns off the display and Pepper and he face each other.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Well, ah, I really wouldn’t know now would I?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What do you mean? All this came from you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: No, all this came from that. Pepper taps Tony’s arc reactor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Give yourself some credit, please. Stark Tower is your baby. Give yourself- twelve percent of the credit.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Twelve percent?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: An argument can be made for fifteen. Pepper walks toward the living room.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Twelve percent of my baby?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (following Pepper) Well, I did do all the heavy lifting. Literally, I lifted the heavy things and sorry but, the security snafu? That was on you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Oh!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: My private elevator. Pepper pours champagne in two glasses.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: You mean our elevator.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, it was teeming with sweaty workmen. I’m going to pay for that comment about percentages in some subtle way later aren’t I?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Not gonna be that subtle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’ll tell you what, next building is gonna say ’Potts’ on the tower.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: On the lease!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Call your mum, can you bunk over?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, the telephone. I’m afraid my protocols are being overridden.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Ah- Tony picks up his high-tech phone and holds up.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (on phone screen) Mr. Stark, we need to talk.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You have reached the Life Model Decoy of Tony Stark. Please leave a message.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (on phone screen) This is urgent.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Then leave it urgently. The elevator opens and Coulson comes out. Security breach. (to Pepper) That’s on you!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Phil! Come in! Pepper and Tony walk over to Coulson, who is entering

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Phil?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: I can’t stay.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, his first name is Agent.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Come on in, we’re celebrating.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (fake smiling) Which is why he can’t stay.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: (handing Tony the laptop) We need you to look this over, as soon as possible. Tony stares at the laptop.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t like being handed things.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: That’s fine because I love to be handed things. So, let’s trade. Pepper swaps with Coulson -- he has with her glass and she has the laptop. She then takes Tony’s glass and passes the laptop on to him. Thank you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Official consulting hours are between eight and five every other Thursday.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: This isn’t a consultation.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Is this about the Avengers? Coulson looks at Pepper Which I know nothing about.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: The Avengers Initiative was scrapped, I thought, and I didn’t even qualify.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: I didn’t know that either.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, apparently I’m volatile, self-obsessed, don’t play well with others.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: That I did know.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: This isn’t about personality profiles anymore.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Whatever! Ms. Potts, got a sec?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Half a moment. Pepper leaves Coulson at the door and goes over to Tony.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You know, I thought we were having a moment.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: I was having twelve percent of a moment. Tony gives Pepper a look. This seems serious. Phil looks pretty shaken.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: How would you notice- why is he Phil?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: What is all this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: This is- ah... Tony grabs the holograms on the laptop and throws them up. Holograms fill the room, each is a article on one of the Avengers. ...this! They both look upon the screens, observing them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: I’m going to take the jet to DC tonight.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Tomorrow.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: You have homework. You have a lot of homework.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Well, what if I didn’t?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: If you didn’t? You mean when you finished? Well, um, then- She leans in and whispers in Tony’s ear.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Square deal. Fly safe. They kiss. Coulson looks away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: Work hard. (approaching Coulson) So, any chance you’re driving by LaGuardia?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: I can drop you off. PEPPER (O.S) Fantastic. Ooh, I want to hear about the ah- cellist, is that still a thing? As they are talking, Tony sees the Tesseract -- It peaks his interest.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER
SPEECH.LINE: What?...Boo. 41

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FACELESS PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: (to Coulson) We’re about forty minutes out from home base, Sir. Coulson stands from a chair and walks over to Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: So, this Doctor Banner was trying to replicate the serum they used on me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: A lot of people were. You were the world’s first superhero. Banner thought Gamma radiation might hold the key to unlocking Erskine’s original formula.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Didn’t really go his way, did it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Not so much. When he’s not that thing though, guy’s like a Stephen Hawking. Rogers looks confused. He’s like a- smart person. I gotta say- it’s an honor to meet you, officially. I sort of met you, I mean, I watched you while you were sleeping. I mean, I was, I was present, while you were unconscious from-the-ice. Steve moves over to the cockpit and Coulson follows (MORE)

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I hope I’m the man for the job.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Oh you are, absolutely. Ah- we made some modifications to the uniform. I had a little design input.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: The uniform? Aren’t the stars and stripes a little...old-fashioned?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Everything that’s happening, the things that are about to come to light, people might just need a little old-fashioned. 43

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: The Chitauri grow restless.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Let them goad themselves. I will lead them in a glorious battle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: Battle? Against the meager might of Earth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Glorious not lengthy- if your force is as formidable as you claim.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: You question us? You question him? He who out the scepter in your hand, who gave you ancient knowledge and new purpose? When you were cast out- defeated!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I was a king! The rightful king of Asgard, betrayed.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: Your ambition is little, full of childish need. We look beyond the Earth to greater worlds the Tesseract will unveil.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You don’t have the Tesseract yet. The Chitauri creature lunges at Loki, hissing. I don’t threaten. But until I open the doors, until your force is mine to command, you are but words.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: You will have your war, Asgardian. If you fail, if the Tesseract is kept from us, there will be no realm, no barren moon, no crevice, where he cannot find you. You think you know pain? He will make you long for something as sweet as pain. 45

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Agent Romanoff- Captain Rogers.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Ma’am.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Hi. (to Coulson) They need you on the bridge; they’re starting the face trace.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: See you there. Coulson, leaves as Natasha and Steve get to know each other while walking.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: It was quite the buzz around here, finding you in the ice. Thought Coulson was gonna swoon. Did he ask you to sign his Captain America trading cards yet?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Trading cards?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: They’re vintage. He’s very proud. They see Banner who is bumping into people while he observes the carrier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor Banner.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, yeah, hi. They told me you’d be coming.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Word is you can find the Cube.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Is that the only word on me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Only word I care about.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Must be strange for you, all of this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Well, this is actually kind of familiar.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Gentlemen, you might wanna step inside in a minute. It’s gonna get a little had to breathe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HELICARRIER INTERCOM
SPEECH.LINE: Flight Mode. Secure the deck. There is a loud whirring and clunking sound and Banner and Rodgers make their way to the edge of the helicarrier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Is this a submarine?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Really, they want me in a submerged pressurized metal container? Propellers begin to spin and the carrier begins to lift into the air. Oh no, this is much worse. The helicarrier begins ascending higher and higher. 48

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CARRIER BRIDGE
SPEECH.LINE: TECH 1 Maximum performance take off, increase output to capacity.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRIDGE TECH
SPEECH.LINE: Power plant performing at capacity. We are clear.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: All engines operating. SHIELD emergency protocol one nine three point six in effect. (to Fury) We’re at level, sir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Good! Let’s vanish.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Engage retro reflection panels. 49

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (to Steve and Banner) Gentlemen. Steve slips Fury the ten dollars he bet earlier, in regards to nothing being able to surprise him. (to Banner) Doctor, thank you for coming. Banner shakes Fury’s hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks for asking nicely. So, um, how long am I staying?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Once we get our hands on the Tesseract, you’re in the wind.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Well where are you with that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: We’re sweeping every wirelessly accessible camera on the planet. Cell phones... Steve stands in the b.g. confused of what’s being said. While Coulson is talking, Natasha moves over to a computer screen where we see Barton’s face trace in progress. She checks the stats. ...laptops, if it’s connected to a satellite, it’s eyes and ears for us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: It’s still not gonna find them in time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You have to narrow your field. How many Spectrometers do you have access to?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: How many are there?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Call every lab you know. Tell them to put the Spectrometers on the roof and calibrate them for Gamma rays. I’ll rough out a tracking algorithm, basic cluster recognition. At least we could rule out a few places. Do you have somewhere for me to work?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Agent Romanoff, would you show Doctor Banner to his laboratory, please? Natasha walks over to Banner and they begin walking out of the bridge area.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re gonna love it, Doc. We got all the toys.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Really? Do you have the com-meter sixty-four?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not sure-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (cutting her off) Oh you’re very young. Fury walks up to Hill.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Hill, did you tell the council that Barton had been compromised?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Was that not procedure? Fury walks off the bridge and onto the air deck, where he looks out. MARIA HILL (CONT’D) Did you tell them who exactly is on your response team? Fury looks over his shoulder.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Doesn’t appear that I have to. 51

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Put it over there. (to Barton) Where did you find all these people?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: SHIELD has no shortage of enemies, Doctor. This the stuff you need?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. Iridium. It’s found in meteorites, it forms anti-protons. It’s very hard to get hold of.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Especially if SHIELD knows you need it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I didn’t know. Loki walks up. (to Loki) Hey! This is wonderful. The Tesseract has shown me so much. It’s- it’s more than knowledge, it’s truth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I know. It, ah- it touches everyone differently. (to Barton) What did it show you Agent Barton?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: My next target.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: (laughing) Stick in the mud. He’s got no soul. No wonder you chose this, this tomb to work in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (snapping) Well, the Radisson doesn’t have three levels of lead lined flooring between SHIELD and that Cube. Selvig walks back to the machine he was working on.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I see why Fury chose you to guard it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You’re going to have to contend with him sir. As long as he’s in the air, I can’t pin him down. And he’ll be putting together a team.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Are they a threat?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: To each other more than likely. But if Fury can get ’em on track, and he might, they could throw some noise our way.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You admire Fury.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: He’s got a clear line of sight.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Is that why you failed to kill him?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: It might be. I was disoriented, and I’m not at my best with a gun.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I want to know everything you can tell me about this team of his. I would- test their mettle. Barton nods. I am weary of scuttling in shadow. I mean to rule this world, not burrow in it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: That’s a risk

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Oh yes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: If you’re set on making yourself known. I could be useful.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Tell me what you need. Barton walks over to a small case, opens it, then takes out his bow. He flicks it open.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I need a distraction. And an eyeball. 52

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: I mean, if it’s not too much trouble.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: No-no, it’s fine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: It’s a vintage set. Took me a couple of years to collect them all. Near mint, slight foxing around the edges but-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT JASPER SITWELL
SPEECH.LINE: We got a hit. Sixty seven percent match. Wait- cross-match, seventy nine percent.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Location?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT JASPER SITWELL
SPEECH.LINE: Stuttgart, Germany. Twenty eight, Königstraße. He’s not exactly hiding.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Captain, you’re up. Steve nods and walks off. 41. 53

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Kneel before me. I said- KNEEL! The people hurry, dropping to their knees. (walking through the mob) Is not this simpler? Is this not your natural state? It’s the unspoken truth of humanity, that you crave subjugation. The bright lure of freedom diminishes your life’s joy in a mad scramble for power, for identity. You were made- to be ruled. In the end- you will always kneel. A German old man gets to his feet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GERMAN OLD MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Not to men like you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: There are no men like me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GERMAN OLD MAN
SPEECH.LINE: There are always men like you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Look to your elder, people. Let him be an example. Loki fires his scepter but Captain America jumps in front of the man -- deflecting the beam off his shield causing it to hit Loki, who falls to the ground.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: You know, the last time I was in Germany and saw a man standing above everybody else, we ended up disagreeing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: The soldier- Loki rises to his feet. -the man out of time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not the one who’s out of time. The quinjet comes in behind Cap with Black Widow inside. A gun unfolds from the underside of the plane.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (over speaker) Loki, drop the weapon and stand down. Loki fires at the jet and it banks hard to avoid it. Cap attacks Loki and the two fight. Loki knocks Cap’s shield to the side and forces him down with his scepter.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Kneel!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Not today. Cap jumps up and does a spin-kick to Loki’s face. The two continue to fight. 63

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (to co-pilot) Guy’s all over the place.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over earpiece) Agent Romanoff, you miss me? The computer screen shows the message ’PA SYSTEMS OVERRIDE’, and AC/DC’s, ’Shoot to Thrill’ begins to play. Natasha smiles heavily. Iron Man flies down and fires a repulsor blast, knocking Loki down.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Make a move reindeer games. Loki’s Asgardian garb fades away and he raises his hands. Good move. Cap walks over to Iron Man. The quinjet begins to land in the b.g.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Mister Stark.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Captain. 64

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over quinjet radio) He saying anything?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into headset) Not a word.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over quinjet radio) Just get him here, we’re low on time. 66

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t like it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What? Rock of Ages giving up so easily?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t remember it being that easy. This guy packs a wallop.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Still, you were pretty spry, for an older fellow. What’s your thing? Pilates?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: What?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: It’s like calisthenics. You might have missed a couple of things. Y’know, doing time as a Cap-sicle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Fury didn’t tell me he was calling you in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, there’s a lot of things Fury doesn’t tell you. There’s a flash of lightening and a roar of thunder.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Where’s this come from? Loki leans forward, looking around.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (to Loki) What’s the matter? Scared of a little lightening?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not overly fond of what follows. Loki looks to the sky. 67

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: What are you doing? Thor enters, jumping down on the ramp. He hits Iron Man away, causing him to fall on Cap. He grabs Loki by the neck and jumps out of the plane.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Now there’s that guy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Another Asgardian?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: That guy’s a friendly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Doesn’t matter. If he frees Loki, or kills him, the Tesseract’s lost. Iron Man begins walking to the edge of the ramp.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Stark, we need a plan of attack.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: I have a plan. Attack! Iron Man flies out of the jet and Cap makes for a parachute.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’d sit this one out, Cap.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t see how I can.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: These guys come from legend, they’re basically Gods.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: There’s only one God ma’am, and I’m pretty sure he doesn’t dress like that. Cap straps on the chute, grabs his shield, and dives out the plane, head first. 47. 71

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Where is the Tesseract?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Oh-ho, I missed you too.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Do I look to be in a gaming mood?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, you should thank me. With the Bifrost gone, how many dark energy did the All-Father have to muster to conjure you here? Your precious Earth. Thor drops his hammer, Mjolnir, and pulls Loki to his feet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I thought you dead.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Did you mourn?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: We all did. Our father-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Your father. He did tell you my true parentage, did he not?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: We were raised together, we played together, we fought together. Do you remember none of that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I remember a shadow, living in the shade of your greatness. I remember you tossing me into an abyss. I who was and should be king!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: So you take the world I love as recompense for your imagined slights? No. The Earth is under my protection, Loki.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Well yes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Then you miss the truth of ruling, brother. Throne would suit you ill. Loki pushes past Thor and walks away, Thor follows.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve seen worlds you’ve never known about. I have grown, Odinson, in my exile. I have seen the true power of the Tesseract, and when I wield it-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Who showed you this power? Who controls the would-be-king?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I am a king!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Not here. You give up the Tesseract; you give up this poisonous dream! You come home.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t have it. Thor summons Mjolnir and holds it ready. You need the Cube to bring me home but I’ve sent it off I know not where.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You listen well brother- Iron Man flies in, knocking him and Thor out of frame. Loki stands waiting.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I’m listening? 72

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Do not touch me again.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Then don’t take my stuff.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You have no idea what you’re dealing with.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Uh- Shakespeare in the park? Doth mother know you wear-th her drapes?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: This is beyond you, metal man. Loki will face Asgardian justice.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He gives up the Cube, he’s all yours. Until then- Faceplate drops.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: -stay out of the way. Iron Man takes a few steps. Tourist. Thor throws Mjolnir, hitting Iron Man square in the chest, sending him flying, landing on his back. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Okay! BACK TO SCENE: Loki smirks from the cliff top as Thor summons Mjolnir then swings it in circles. Iron Man gets to his feet and fires a repulse blast at Thor, then flies at him, kicking him through a tree. Thor stands, summoning a bolt of lightning as Loki watches in the distance. Thor sends the bolt at Iron Man. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Power at four hundred percent capacity.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: How bout that? BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man fires at Thor. The two stand ready then fly at each other, smashing through the trees and scraping up a cliff side. Trees are toppled as they crash to the forest grounds. Thor and Iron Man stand quickly. Thor sends in a left hook so Iron Man is about to punch but Thor grabs his fist. Iron Man is about to send in his left hook and Thor grabs that too. Thor begins to crush Iron Man’s right gauntlet with ease. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET: Tony looks at the HUD which is alerting him. He groans and thinks. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man lifts his palm, that is being crushed, and he fires a blast at Thor’s face -- it does nothing to Thor so he head butts him. Thor headbutts him back. Iron Man flies back, coming to a stop before launching himself at Thor. Iron Man throws Thor into a broken tree. Thor then stands and the two go at it for a bit longer -- a fist fight. Thor summons his hammer about to slam down on the chest of Tony but Iron Man ditches, causing Thor to fall. Behind the rising Thor, Iron Man swoops in and punches him. They get ready to sends blows at each other until Cap’s shield ricochets off both their chest. CAPTAIN AMERICA (O.S) Hey! Cap catches his shield.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: That’s enough! He jumps down of the tree and approaches Thor and Iron Man. Now I don’t know what you plan on doing here-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve come here to put an end to Loki’s schemes!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Then prove it. Put that hammer down.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, yeah! No! Bad call, he loves his hammer- Thor swings his hammer back, sending Iron Man behind him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You want me to put hammer down? Thor leaps, swinging Mjolnir, Cap raises the shield over his head. When the two connect there is a loud boom and a flash of light. The three are thrown backwards. They slowly get to their feet and come together.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Are we done here? Thor looks around. 73

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: In case it’s unclear, you try to escape- you so much as scratch that glass- Fury pushes a button and the floor beneath the cell drops away to nothing, the wind screams. Thirty thousand feet straight down in a steel trap. You get how that works? He pushes a button and closes the floor. He gestures first to Loki. Ant. (gestures to panel) Boot.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: It’s an impressive cage. Not built, I think, for me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Built for something a lot stronger than you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Oh I’ve heard. (turns to a camera)... 76

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Ooh. It burns you to have come so close, to have the Tesseract, to have power- unlimited power, and for what? (smiles and faces the camera) A... 78

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Well, let me know if ’real power’ wants a magazine or something. Fury exits. 80

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: He really grows on you doesn’t he?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Loki’s gonna drag this out. So, Thor, what’s his play?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: He has an army called the Chitauri. They’re not of Asgard nor any world known. He means to lead the against your people. They will win him the Earth, in return, I suspect, for the Tesseract.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: An army, from outer space?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: So, he’s building another portal. That’s what he needs Erik Selvig for.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Selvig?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: He’s an astrophysicist.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: He’s a friend.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Loki has them under some kind of spell- along with one of ours.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I wanna know why Loki let us take him. He’s not leading an army from here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t think we should be focusing on Loki. That guy’s brain is a bag full of cats, you can small crazy on him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Have care how you speak. Loki is beyond reason but he is of Asgard, and he is my brother.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: He killed eighty people in two days.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: He’s adopted?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: I think it’s about the mechanics. Iridium, what do they need the Iridium for? Tony and Coulson come walking in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: It’s a stabilizing agent. (to Coulson, quietly) I’m saying, take a weekend; I’ll fly you to Portland. Keep love alive. Coulson peels off from Tony, who is heading over to Thor. Means the portal won’t collapse on itself like it did at SHIELD. (to Thor) No hard feelings point break, you got a mean swing. Thor gives Tony a look as he walks to the control panels.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Also, means the portal can open as wide and stay open as long as Loki wants.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (attitude) He turns!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Sounds exhausting! He begins messing with the screens, sticking something to the underside of a desk. The rest of the raw materials, Agent Barton can get his hands on pretty easily. Only major component he still needs is a power source- of high energy density. Something to- kick start the Cube.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: When did you become an expert in thermonuclear astrophysics?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Last night. The packet, Selvig’s notes, the extraction theory papers- am I the only one who did the reading?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Does Loki need any particular kind of power source?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: He’s have to heat the Cube to a hundred and twenty million kelvin just to break through the Coulomb barrier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Unless, Selvig has figured out how to stabilize the Quantum Tunneling effect.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Well, if he could do that he could achieve heavy-ion fusion at any reactor on the planet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Finally. Someone who speaks English.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (to the others) Is that what just happened? Stark and Banner shake hands.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: It’s good to meet you, Doctor Banner. Your work on anti-electronic collisions is unparalleled. And I’m a huge fan of the way you- lose control and turn into an enormous green rage monster.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: ...Thanks. Fury enters.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor Banner is only here to track the Cube. I was hoping you might join him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’d start with that stick of his. It may be magical but it works an awful lot like a HYDRA weapon.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know about that, but it is powered by the Cube. And I like to know how Loki used it to turn two of the sharpest men I know into his personal flying monkeys.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Monkeys? I do not understand-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I do! The entire room goes instantly silent, staring at Steve. (MORE)

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Shall we play, Doctor?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: This way, sir. The two men walk off. ON A SHIELD WORKER: He resumes play Galaga again. 81

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: The Gamma readings are definitely consistent with Selvig’s reports on the Tesseract. But it’s gonna take weeks to process. Stark works on a screen.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: If we bypass their mainframe and direct route to the Homer cluster we can clock this at around six hundred teraflops.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: All I packed was a toothbrush.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (giggles a bit) You know, you should come by Stark Tower some time. Top ten floors- all R and D. You’d love it, it’s a candy land.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks but...last time I was in New York I kind of broke...Harlem.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I promise a stress free environment. No tension, no surprises. He zaps Banner in the side.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Ow!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Hey!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Nothing? Steve approaches.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Are you nuts?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Jury’s out! (to Banner) You really have got a lid on it, haven’t you? What’s your secret? Mellow jazz, bongo drums, huge bag of weed?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Is everything a joke to you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Funny things are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Threatening the safety of everyone on this ship isn’t funny. No offense, Doc.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: No it’s alright. I wouldn’t have come aboard if I couldn’t handle pointy things.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re tip-toeing, big man. You need to strut.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: And you need to focus on the problem, Mister Stark.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You think I’m not? Why did Fury call us in? Why now, why not before? What isn’t he telling us? I can’t do the equation unless I have all the variables.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You think Fury’s hiding something?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He’s a spy. Captain, he’s the spy. His secrets have secrets. He gestures to Banner. It’s bugging him to, isn’t it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, Aah, I just wanna finish my work here and-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: A warm light for all mankind," Loki’s jab at Fury about the Cube.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I heard it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I think that was meant for you. He gestures to Stark, who offers him a blueberry. Even if Barton didn’t tell Loki about the tower, it was still all over the news.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: The Stark Tower? That big ugly- Stark gives him a look. -building in New York?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: It’s powered by an arc reactor, self-sustaining energy source. That building will run itself for, what, a year?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: It’s just the prototype. (to Rodgers) I’m kind of the only name in clean energy right now, that’s what he’s getting at.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: So, why didn’t SHIELD bring him in on the Tesseract project? What are they even doing in the energy business in the first place?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I should probably look into that as soon as my decryption program finishes breaking into all of SHIELD’s secure files.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry did you say-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: JARVIS has been running it since I hit the bridge. In a few hours I’ll know every dirty secret SHIELD has ever tried to hide. Blueberry?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Yet you’re confused about why they didn’t want you around.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: An intelligence organization that fears intelligence? Historically, not awesome.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I think Loki’s trying to wind us up. This is a man who means to start a war and if we don’t stay focused he’ll succeed. We have orders, we should follow them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Following’s not really my style.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: And you’re all about style, aren’t you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Out of the people in this room, which one is "A" wearing a spangly outfit and "B" not of use?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Steve, tell me none of this smells a little funky to you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Just find the Cube. Cap exits the lab, pauses and turns, walking off in another direction.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: That’s the guy my dad never shut up about? Wondering if they shouldn’t have kept him on ice.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Guy’s not wrong about Loki, he does have the jump on us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What he’s got is an ACME dynamite kit. It’s gonna blow up in his face, and I’m gonna be there when it does.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: I’ll read all about it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Mhm, or, you’ll be suiting up with the rest of us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Now, you see I don’t get a suit of armor. I’m exposed, like a nerve, it’s a nightmare.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You know, I’ve got a cluster shrapnel, trying every second to crawl its way into my heart. This stops it- He taps the arc reactor. -this little circle of light. It’s part of me now, not just armor. It’s a terrible privilege.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: But you can control it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Because I learned how.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: It’s different.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, I read all about your accident. That much Gamma exposure- should’ve killed you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: So you’re saying that the Hulk- the Other Guy- saved my life? That’s nice. That’s nice sentiment. Saved it for- what?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I guess we’ll find out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You may not enjoy that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And you just might. 82

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: ...moved Jane Foster. We’ve got an excellent observatory in Tromsø. She was asked to consult there very suddenly yesterday. Handsome fee, private plane, very remote. She’ll be safe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you. It’s no accident Loki taking Erik Selvig. I dread what he plans for him once he’s done. Erik is a good man. Coulson and Thor begins walking, through the bridge.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: He talks about you a lot. You changed his life. You changed everything around here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: They were better as they were. We pretend on Asgard that we’re more advanced, but we- we come here battling like Bildschneip.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Like what?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Bildschneip. You know, huge, scaly, big antlers. You don’t have those?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: No.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Huh! Well they are repulsive, and they trample everything in their path. Thor moves over to a large window. When I first came to earth, Loki’s rage followed me here and your people paid the price. And now again. In my youth I courted war.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: War hasn’t started yet. You think you can make Loki tell us where the Tesseract is?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I do not know. Loki’s mind is far afield, it’s not just power he craves, it’s vengeance upon me. There’s no pain would prise his need from him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: A lot of guys think that, until the pain starts.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: What are you asking me to do?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m asking, what are you prepared to do?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Loki is a prisoner.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Then why do I feel like he’s the only person on this boat that wants to be here? 86

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Hm. There’s not many people that can sneak up on me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: But you figured I’d come.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: After. After whatever tortures Fury can concoct, you would appear as a friend, as a balm. And I would cooperate.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I wanna know what you’ve done to Agent Barton.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I’d say I’ve expanded his mind.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: And once you’ve won. Once you’re king of the mountain. What happens to his mind?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Is this love, Agent Romanoff?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Love is for children. I owe him a debt.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Tell me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Before I worked for SHIELD, I uh- well, I made a name for myself. I have a very specific skill set. I didn’t care who I used it for, or on. I got on SHIELD’s radar in a bad way. Agent Barton was sent to kill me, he made a different call.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: And what will you do if I vow to spare him?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Not let you out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Ah, no. But I like this. Your world in the balance, and you bargain for one man?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Regime’s fall everyday. I tend not to weep over that, I’m Russian, or I was.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: And what are you now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: It’s really not that complicated. I got red in my ledger. I’d like to wipe it out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Can you? Can you wipe out that much red? Drakov’s daughter? Sao Paulo? The hospital fire? Barton told me everything. Your ledger is dripping, it’s gushing red, and you think saving a man no more virtuous than yourself will change anything? This is the basest sentimentality. This is a child, a prayer. Pathetic 66. 87

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I won’t touch Barton! Not until I make him kill you. Slowly, intimately, in every way he knows you fear. Natasha becomes scared out of her mind. And then he’ll wake just long enough to see his good work, Natasha turns away from Loki in horror. and when he screams I’ll split his skull! This is my bargain, you mewling quim! Sounds of Natasha sobbing. Her head hangs low.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re a monster!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: (grinning menacingly) Oh, no. You brought the monster. Natasha lifts her head and turns to face Loki -- her face is dry.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: So, Banner? That’s your play.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: What? Natasha begins to exit the room.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Loki means to unleash the Hulk. Keep Banner in the lab, I’m on my way. Send Thor as well. She stops and faces Loki. Thank you, for your cooperation! Natasha skimmers off. 91

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: What are you doing, Mr. Stark?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Uh- kind of been wondering the same thing about you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re supposed to be locating the Tesseract.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: We are, the model’s locked and we’re sweeping for the signature now. When we get a hit, we’ll have the location within half a mile.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And you’ll get your cube back, no muss, no fuss. What is Phase Two?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Phase Two is SHIELD used the Cube to make weapons. (to Tony) Sorry, computer was moving a little slow for me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Rogers, we gathered everything related to the Tesseract. This does not mean that we’re-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry, Nick. Tony turns the screen towards Fury. It shows a plan for some a missile. What were you lying?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I was wrong, Director. The world hasn’t changed a bit. Thor and Natasha enter. Banner looks to her.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Did you know about this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You wanna think about removing yourself from this environment, doctor?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (laughs) I was in Calcutta, I was pretty well removed.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Loki’s manipulating you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: And you’ve been doing what exactly?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You didn’t come here because I bat my eyelashes at you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, and I’m not leaving because suddenly you get a little twitchy. (MORE)

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (pointing at Thor) Because of him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Last year earth had a visitor from another planet who had a grudge match that leveled a small town. We learned that not only are we not alone, but we are hopelessly- hilariously, out-gunned.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: My people want nothing but peace with your planet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: But you’re not the only people out there, are you? And, you’re not the only threat. The world’s filling up with people who can’t be matched, they can’t be controlled.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Like you controlled the cube!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Your work with the Tesseract is what drew Loki to it, and his allies. It is the signal to all the realms that the earth is ready for A HIGHER FORM OF WAR.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: A higher form?!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: You forced our hand! We had to come up with some-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Nuclear deterrent! ’Cause that always calms everything right down. Everyone becomes hostile and begin cutting each other off.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Remind me again how you made your fortune, Stark?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sure if he still made weapons, Stark would be neck deep-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Wait-Wait! Hold on! How is this now about me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry, isn’t everything?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I thought humans were more evolved than this. Everyone begins arguing over each other.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Excuse me, did we come to your planet and blow stuff up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: (to Thor) Tis your champion.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: YOU’RE NOT MY CHAMPION!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Are you boys really that naive? S.H.I.E.L.D monitors potential threats.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (to Thor and Steve) You furious? I’m furious.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (to Natasha) And Captain America is on the threat poll?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (to Banner) We all are!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: That’s not your concern doctor! As they argue over one another & the scepter glows strongly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (to Steve) You’re on that list? Are you above or below angry bees?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I swear to God, Stark, one more crack...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re a threat. VERBAL THREAT! I FEEL THREATENED!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: SHOW SOME RESPECT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: RESPECT WHAT!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (to Thor) YEAH MAN HANDLE ME NOW, THAT’LL BE GOOD! 92

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: Transport six-six-five-oh. Please relay your form code. Got you on the computer but not on the data log. What is your haul? Over.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: Arms to ammunition. Over. 93

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You speak of control, yet you court chaos!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: It’s his MO, isn’t it? I mean, what are we, a team? No, no, no. We’re a chemical mixture that makes chaos. We’re- we’re a time bomb.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: You need to step away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Why shouldn’t they guy let off a little steam?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You know damn well why! Back off!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, I’m starting to want you to make me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, big man in a suit of armor. Take that off, what are you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I know guys with none of that worth ten of you. I’ve seen the footage. The only thing you really fight for is yourself. You’re not the guy to make the sacrifice play, to lay down on a wire and let the other guy crawl over you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I think I would just cut the wire.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Always a way out. You know, you may not be a threat, but you better stop pretending to be a hero.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: A hero, like you? You’re a laboratory experiment, Rogers. Everything special about you came out of a bottle. 94

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Put on the suit, let’s go a few rounds.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: (laughs) You people are so petty, and tiny.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, this is a team.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Agent Romanoff, would you escort Dr. Banner back to his-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: WHERE? YOU RENTED MY ROOM!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: The cell was just-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: IN CASE YOU NEEDED TO KILL ME. BUT YOU CAN’T, I KNOW, I TRIED! He stops, everyone is staring at him. I got low. I didn’t see an end so I put a bullet in my mouth and the other guy spit it out. So I moved on, I focused on helping other people. I was good until you dragged me back into this freak show and put everyone here at risk. You wanna know my secret, Agent Romanoff? You wanna know how I stay calm? Everyone is watching Banner, Fury and Natasha reach for their guns.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor Banner, put down the scepter. Banner looks down, surprised, to see the spear in his hand. The monitor makes a noise, signaling the Tesseract has been located. Banner puts the scepter back on the table and walks over to the screen on the other side of the room.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Got it!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Sorry, kids. You don’t get to see my party trick after all.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Located the Tesseract?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I can get there faster.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Look, all of us-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NOVAR
SPEECH.LINE: The Tesseract belongs on Asgard, no human is a match for it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You’re not going alone! Tony smacks his hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You gonna stop me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Put on the suit, let’s find out!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not afraid to hit an old man.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Put on the suit. Banner sees something on the monitor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Oh-my-god. 96

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Put on the suit.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yep. Steve helps Tony up and the run out of the lab. 101

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: All hands engaged. The whole place is hectic. 102

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Hill! 104

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Number Three engine is down.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE CARRIER BRIDGE TECH
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve been hit. Hill runs over to a bridge tech’s station.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Did we get a run in? Talk to me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OFF SCREEN WORKER
SPEECH.LINE: We got a fire in Engine Three. CARRIER BRIDGE TECH 1 The line looks mostly in tact but it’s impossible to get out there to make repairs while we’re in the air.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: We lose one more engine we won’t be. (into earpiece) Somebody’s gotta get outside and patch that engine. 105

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Stark, you copy that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Fury’s earpiece) I’m on it. 106

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Coulson’s earpiece) Coulson, initiate defensive lock down in the contingent center. Then get to the armory. 107

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Romanoff! 108

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Okay!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (to three of his men) Keep that engine down. (to two others) Detention, wait for camera to go dark. (to last two) Stay close. 111

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Find engine three. I’ll meet you there. Cap peels off as Tony approaches a tech room. Inside, Tony’s IRON MAN suit stands waiting, lit from above in all its glory. 112

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor? Bruce, you gotta fight it. This is just what Loki wants. We’re gonna be okay. Listen to me. Two MAINTENANCE GUYS run in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MAINTENANCE GUY
SPEECH.LINE: You hurt? Natasha waves them away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We’re gonna be okay. Right? I swear on my life I will get you out of this, you will walk away, and never ever --

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: (growling) Your life? His voice has the change in it -- the bitter amusement is morphing to a growled threat. Banner begins to transform into the Hulk, shirt tearing, he throws himself away from Romanoff, who looks terrified, then he turns to look at her, transforming -- just as the lights go out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Bruce. The transformation completes and Banner’s alter ego, the Hulk, gets unsteadily to his feet, and roars. Romanoff wrenches her foot free and stands looking -- and the Hulk turns to look at her. She turns and runs up the catwalk stairs as the Hulk chases her. She swings over a catwalk, and rolls under a turbine, as the Hulk tears down the stairs. Natasha jumps through small places as the Hulk grabs after her, roaring loudly. She crawls away under pipes. 113

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Bring the carrier to a one-eight-zero south. Take us to the water.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: We’re blind. Navigation re calibrated after the engine failure.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Is the sun coming up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, sir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Then put us on the left. Get us over water. One more turbine goes down then we drop. 115

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Stark! Stark, I’m here. Tony, in full Iron Man armor flies close to the engine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Good. Let’s see what we got. He begins to examine the engine, his suit scanning through the different levels of machinery. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (to himself) I gotta get this super conducting cooling system back online before I can access the rotors, work on dislodging the debris. BACK TO SCENE:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: (to Steve) I need you to get to that engine control panel and tell me which relays are in overload position. Rogers jumps and swings himself over to the control panel and opens it up while Iron Man works on the engine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Steve’s earpiece) What’s it look like in there?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: It seems to run on some form of electricity.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Well, you’re not wrong. 116

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: We’re not your enemies, Banner! Try to think! Hulk punches Thor across the room and through a container. 118

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (over Iron Man’s helmet) ’Kay, the relays are intact. Cap pushes the engine control panel back in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: What’s our next move? The CAMERA PULLS OUT a bit

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Even if I clear the rotors, this thing won’t re-engage without a jump.... INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: ...I’m gonna have to get in there and push. BACK TO SCENE:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Well, if that thing gets up to speed, you’ll get shredded! BEGIN INTERCUT: IRON MAN HELMET / STEVE

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Then stay in the control unit and reverse polarity long enough to disengage maglev and that should-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Speak English!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: See that red lever? Cap looks to his side. (over Steve’s earpiece) It’ll slow the rotors down long enough for me to get out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Stand by it, wait for my word.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: END INTERCUT
SPEECH.LINE: Rogers makes his way over to the lever. 119

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: We need full evac on the lower hangar bed. Hill nods and walks up and signals some agents. A small device rolls over to their feet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: GRENADE! The device explodes sending agents flying. In the smoke, Loki’s men enter, guns at the ready. Fury knocks one out, using his gun to shoot at another. While he is taking care of a third, a forth man enters and is about to fire when Hill shoots him in the head. She is pissed and bleeding. 121

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got perimeter breach. Hostiles are in SHIELD gear. Call out to every junction. Coulson pushes down on a switch and scans his eyeball. 122

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got the Hulk and Thor on Research Level Four. Levels Two and Three are gone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, the Hulk will tear this place apart!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Get his attention.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Escort 6-Oh, proceed to Wishbone and... 124

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (over jet radio) ...engage hostile. Don’t get too close.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG SHIELD PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: Copy. The jet flies to where Hulk and Thor are fighting, seemingly evenly matched.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG SHIELD PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: Target acquired. Target engaged. He fires his guns toward Hulk. The barrage of bullets bounce off of Hulk. He roars, running at the window. Hulk crashes through it, leaping at the jet. Target angry. Target angry. Hulk lands on the nose of the jet and tears at the metal as it swerves in the air. The pilot tries to eject himself but the Hulk grabs him and throws him off to the side. The pilot’s parachute opens and the plane explodes, sending Hulk plummeting to the earth. 125

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
