SPEECH.LINE: (to himself) They are not getting through here so what the- Barton fires arrows from above and they explode. He fires another which hits the control panel. Fury sees him and begins to shoot, while the arrow, having hit a plug, hacks the helicarrier systems, causing a second engine to malfunction, it’s dead.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: Engine One is now in shutdown. The helicarrier tilts dangerously. Everyone in the bridge begins rolling.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SHIELD WORKER
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, we’ve lost all power in Engine One. 127

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Natasha’s earpiece) It’s Barton, he took out our systems. He’s headed for the detention lab. Does anybody copy?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) This is Agent Romanoff. I copy. Natasha staggers to her feet. Ready. 85. 128

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over earpiece) Stark, we’re losing altitude. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yep, noticed. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man flies in between the rotors and begins to push, slowly picking up speed as sparks fly. Cap is forced over the edge by a gunman and falls -- almost dropping off the carrier, hanging on by a wire. 129

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Are you ever not going to fall for that? 130

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: (laughs) The humans think us immortal. Shall we test that? Loki moves to open the chute beneath the cell, dropping Thor to, what for any regular person, would be certain death. Coulson suddenly appears, wielding a large prototype Phase Two weapon.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Move away please. Loki steps back from the panel. Coulson gestures to the gun. Do you like this? We started working on the prototype after you sent the Destroyer. Even I don’t know what it does. Do you wanna find out? Coulson prepares to fire the weapon when Loki disappears, reappearing behind him and thrusting the point of his spear through Coulson’s chest. He yells and drops to the floor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: NO! Loki returns to the panel, opening the chute and pressing the button which sends the cell, and Thor, falling from the ship. 132

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha! She sends him a left hook. 87. 133

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: You’re going to lose.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Am I?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: It’s in your nature,

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: your heroes are scattered, your floating fortress falls from the sky. Where is my disadvantage?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: You lack conviction.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t think I- Coulson fires the weapon, which shoots a blast of fire similar to that of the Destroyer, sending Loki flying through a wall.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: So that’s what it does. 88. 137

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: All hands to your stations immediately. 138

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Cap hit the lever! INTERCUT: CAP / IRON MAN HELMET Cap still hangs from the side of the ship by a power cord.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: i need a minute here!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Lever! Now! Cap hauls himself up.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: END INTERCUT
SPEECH.LINE: Iron Man is pushed back up against one of the rotors, now spinning too fast for him to escape. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET: TONY (CONT’D) Uh-oh. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man is sucked into the blades and is spun wildly around before Cap manages to pull the lever and he is able to fly out. He manages to right himself and flies back to the ship, taking out the gunman shooting at Cap. 89. 139

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry boss. They got rabbited.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Just stay awake. Eyes on me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: Oh I’m clockin’ out here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Not an option.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT COULSON
SPEECH.LINE: It’s okay, boss. This was never gonna work- if they didn’t have something- to His breathing halts and Fury stands to let the medical team through. He leans against the railing. 141

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Hill’s earpiece) Agent Coulson is down. Hill pushes the doctor away. 142

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SHIELD WORKER
SPEECH.LINE: (over Natasha’s earpiece) A medical team is on its way to your location.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Natasha’s earpiece) They’re here. 90. 143

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over their earpiece) They called it. 144

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: These were in Phil Coulson’s jacket. Guess he never did get you to sign them. Fury scatters them on the table. Some are wet with blood. We’re dead in the air up here. Our communications, location of the cube, Banner, Thor. I got nothing for you. Lost my one good eye. Think I had that coming. Fury begins to make his way around the table to Steve and Tony. Yes, we were going to build an arsenal with the Tesseract. I never put all my chips on that number, though, because I was playing something even riskier. There was an idea, Stark knows this, called the Avengers Initiative. Fury reaches a chair between Tony and Steve The idea was to bring together a group of remarkable people, see if they could become something more. See if they could work together when we needed them to, to fight the battles that we never could. Phil Coulson died still believing in that idea, in heroes. Tony stands and walks out. Well, it’s an old fashioned notion. 91. 145

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: You fell out of the sky.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Did I hurt anyone?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: There’s nobody around here to get hurt. You did scare the hell out of some pigeons though.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Lucky.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Or just good aim. You were awake when you fell.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You saw?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: The whole thing, right through the ceiling. Big and green and buck ass nude. Here- SECURITY GUARD throws Banner a some clothes, which he begins to pull on. didn’t think those would fit you until you shrunk down to a regular size fella.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Are you an alien?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: What?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: From outer space, an alien?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: No.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Well then, son, you’ve got a condition. Banner steps down from the pile of rubble in the warehouse, pulling on the shirt. SECURITY GUARD (CONT’D) So, which one is it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Sorry?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Are you a big guy that gets all little, or a little guy that, ah- sometimes blows up large?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You know- I’m not even sure.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: You got somewhere to go?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Stark Tower. I- no. The Security Guard looks at him. Yes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: I’d expect some confusion of the mind, since your body’s kind of all over the place, but it has to be one or the other. The Security Guard gestures Banner to follow him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: I know where I could do the most good, but it’s where I can do the most harm.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Well, that’s no different than anybody else. They walk out the doors.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know which way to go.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SECURITY GUARD
SPEECH.LINE: Your mind’s already made up, son. The rest of you will follow. 147

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Clint, you’re gonna be alright.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You know that? Is that what you know? I gotta go in though. I have to flush him out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You gotta level out, it’s gonna take time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You don’t understand. Have you ever had someone take your brain and play? Pull you out and stuff something else in? You know what it’s like to be unmade?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You know that I do.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Why am I back? How did you get him out?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Cognitive recalibration. I hit you really hard in the head.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks. Natasha begins to remove the strap restraints. Natasha, how many agents?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t. Don’t do that to yourself, Clint. This is Loki. This is monsters and magic and nothing we were ever trained for.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Loki. He get away?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. I don’t suppose you know where?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Didn’t need to know. Didn’t ask. He’s gonna make his play soon though. Today. Natasha walks to the door.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We gotta stop him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah? Who’s we?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know. Whoever is left.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Well, if I put an arrow through Loki’s eye socket I’d sleep better I suppose.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Now you sound like you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: But you don’t. You’re a spy, not a soldier. Now you want to wade into a war. Why? What did Loki do to you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: He didn’t, I just-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve been compromised. I got red in my ledger. I’d like to wipe it out. 148

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Was he married?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: No. There was a uh- cellist, I think.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry. He seemed like a good man.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He was an idiot. Tony and Steve slowly move toward each other.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Why? For believing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: For taking on Loki alone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: He was doing his job.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He was out of his league. He should have waited. He should have-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Sometimes there isn’t a way out, Tony.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Right. How did that work for him?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Is this the first time you’ve lost a soldier?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: We are not soldiers! I’m not marching to Fury’s fife.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Neither am I. He’s got the same blood on his hands that Loki does, but right now we gotta put that behind us and get this done. Now Loki needs a power source, if we can put together a list- Tony looks down at the place Coulson fell, there is a dent in the wall.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He made it personal.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: That’s not the point.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: That is the point. That’s Loki’s point. He hit us all right where we live. Why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: To tear us apart.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, divide and conquer is great but- he knows he has to take us out to win, right? That’s what he wants. He wants to beat us, he wants to be seen doing it. He wants an audience.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Right. I caught his act in Stuttgart.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. That’s just previews, this is- this is opening night. And Loki, he’s a full-tail diva. He wants flowers, he wants parades, he wants a monument built to the skies with his name plastered....Son of-a-bitch. 97. 149

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Time to go.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Go where?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: I’ll tell you on the way. Can you fly one of those jets? Barton enters from the restroom, drying his hands.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I can. Cap looks at Natasha, who nods.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Got a suit?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Then suit up. SERIES OF SHOTS: A) In the field, Thor lifts Mjolnir to the skies. B) Cap straps his shield onto his back. C) Barton puts on his quiver. D) Natasha powers up her Widow’s Bite. Her bracelets light up. E) Tony is in a workshop making repairs to his helmet. Agents walk by in the background. The helmet lights up. F) Thor summons a bolt of lightening. The field grows dark, with clouds. His armor slowly begins to fly on.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SHIELD ENGINEER
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, you guys aren’t authorized to be in here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Son, just don’t! 152

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Agent Hill.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Those cards, they were in Coulson’s locker, not in his jacket.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (staring at the cards) They needed the push. He sees the quinjet and Iron Man take off towards the city.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: INTERCOM VOICE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got unauthorized departure from Bay Six.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: They found it. Get our communications back up, whatever you have to do. I want eyes on everything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, sir. 99. 153

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, I turned off the arc reactor. The device is already self-sustaining

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Shut it down, Dr. Selvig.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: It’s too late! She can’t stop now. She wants to show us something! A new universe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: (annoyed) Okay. He fires at the barrier around the device, but the Tesseract deflects it, sending the energy outwards, knocking Selvig out and Iron Man back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: The barrier is pure energy. It’s unbreachable.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, I got that. Iron Man looks down to see Loki on the platform outside the penthouse. I’m beat.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, the Mark Seven is not ready for deployment. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Then skip the spinning rims, we’re on the clock. 100. BACK TO SCENE: Tony lands and as his suit is deconstructed, he walks through into the tower penthouse, watching Loki carefully. Loki walks in as well. 155

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Please tell me you’re going to appeal to my humanity.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Uh- actually, I’m planning to threaten you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You should have left your armor on for that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, it’s seen a bit of mileage. You’ve got the uh- blue stick of destiny. Would you like a drink?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Stalling me won’t change anything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: No, no, no- threatening. No drink? You sure? I’m having one.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: The Chitauri are coming, nothing will change that. What have I to fear?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: The Avengers. It’s what we call ourselves, sort of like a team. ’Earth’s Mightiest Heroes’ type of thing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, I’m met them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, takes us a while to get any traction, I’ll give you that one. But, let’s do a head count here. Your brother, the Demi-God;

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: That was the plan. Tony begins to walk to the center of the penthouse where Loki is.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Not a great plan. When they come, and they will, they’ll come for you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: I have an army.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: We have a Hulk.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, I thought the beast had wandered off.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah- you’re missing the point. There’s no throne, there is no version of this, where you come out on top. Maybe your army comes and maybe it’s too much for us, but it’s all on you. ’Cause if we can’t protect the earth, you can be damned well sure we’ll avenge it. Loki walks over to Tony, pointing his scepter.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: How will your friends have time for me, when they’re so busy fighting you? Loki walks up to Tony, and places the tip of the scepter over his heart. It clinks against the arc reactor. This usually works.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Well, performance issues. You know? Loki grabs Tony by the throat and throws him across the room. JARVIS, anytime now. Loki grabs Tony again.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You will all fall before me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: JARVIS. Deploy. Loki sends Stark crashing through the window, and plummeting toward the ground. TONY (O.S) Deploy! Behind Loki, the Mark Seven suit goes rocketing past and out after Stark.... 156

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: And there’s one other person you pissed off! His name is Phil. Iron Man fires a repulsor blast at Loki and he is knocked down. Meanwhile the device has powered up and shoots a stream of blue energy at the sky, which opens into a portal where the Chitauri army waits. The hoards of aliens begin to fly through. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Right! Army. 157

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Loki, turn off the Tesseract or I’ll destroy it!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: You can’t. There is no stopping it. There is only the war!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: So be it. Loki leaps at Thor and the two begin to fight, a blast from Loki’s scepter sending one of the letters of STARK falling to the ground. 162

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (over HUD display) ...three heading north east.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What, did you stop for drive-thru? Swing that park, I’m gonna lay ’em out for you. 164

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, we have more incoming.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Fine. Let’s keep them occupied. 166

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Nat!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I see ’em. BACK TO SCENE: Loki spots the jet. He throws Thor to the floor, then blasts one of the jet’s rotor blades with his scepter -- it catches fire. Thor sees, angry, charges Loki and tackles him as the quinjet falls to the ground. Loki and Thor throw punches. INSIDE THE QUINJET: Natasha and Barton hold on for their dear lives. Cap grabs a hold of the roof as the plane grazes buildings and crashes to the street. Natasha and Barton remove their headsets, open the ramp, and Cap and them exit the jet. 168

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: We gotta get back up there. They run onto the overpass, looking up at Stark Tower. They freeze as they see a giant armored Leviathan -- a warship of the Chitauri, flies through the portal with more warriors. They warriors jump onto the side of buildings and into the buildings where they shoot civilians. CAPTAIN AMERICA (CONT’D) Stark, are you seeing this? TONY (V.O) Seeing. still working on believing... INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: ...Where’s Banner? Has he shown up yet?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: (over radio) Banner?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Just keep me posted. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man flies after the Leviathan. JARVIS, find me a soft spot. The Leviathan tears through buildings, roaring. 169

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Look at this! Look around you! You think this madness will end with your rule?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: It’s too late. It’s too late to stop it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: No. We can, together. Loki pauses, then slips a knife into his hand and stabs Thor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Sentiment! Thor gets back up and lifts Loki, then drops him. Loki rolls himself off the edge of the building, only to land on one of the flying Chitauri crafts. He flies off with a troop of Chitauri. 170

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got civilians trapped. Loki flies over them on the flying crafts.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Loki. CUTAWAY TO STREETS: Loki and his following troop blowing up the streets. A JAPANESE FAMILY runs away as they are almost shot. A flying craft flies through a Dr. Pepper truck. Loki and the troop come to a busy street -- the one where the YOUNG COP and POLICE SERGEANT are at -- and blow up cars. The police and civilians run for their lives. BACK TO OVERPASS: They’re fish in a barrel down there. Natasha stands and fires both her guns at an incoming group of Chitauri.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We got this. It’s good. Go!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: You think you can hold them off?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Captain, it would be my genuine pleasure. Barton grabs a arrow and shoots it, hitting one alien in the head, the arrow quickly separates into more arrows, killing three Chitauri aliens. Cap leaves the other two fighting and jumps off an overpass, rolling onto a bus and into the street. Barton helps people off a bus as Natasha shoots her pistols at Chitauri. He runs over to Natasha and begins releasing arrows as she shoots.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Just like Budapest all over again!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You and I remember Budapest very differently. 108. 171

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG COP
SPEECH.LINE: It’s gonna be an hour before they scramble the National Guard.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: POLICE SERGEANT
SPEECH.LINE: National Guard! The two duck to avoid a Chitauri blast. POLICE SERGEANT (CONT’D) Does the army know what’s happening here?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YOUNG COP
SPEECH.LINE: Do we? Cap jumps down on the car in front of them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: (gesturing) You need men in these buildings. There are people inside and they can be running right into the line of fire. You take them to the basement or through the subway, you keep them off the streets. I need a perimeter as far back as 39th.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: POLICE SERGEANT
SPEECH.LINE: Why the hell should I take orders from you? Two Chitauri warriors attack Cap, he fights them off easily then turns back to the two men. The two cops stand shock. The POLICE SERGEANT reacts and walks back to his men.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: POLICE SERGEANT
SPEECH.LINE: I need men in those buildings, lead the people down and away from the streets. (into radio) We gonna set up a perimeter all the way down to 39th street. CUTAWAY TO IRON MAN: Iron Man fires a stream of ammunition at the Leviathan, which turns to follow him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: It noticed me... BACK TO IRON MAN:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: ...yay! Stark flies off and the Leviathan follows him. 172

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: What’s the story upstairs?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: The power surrounding the cube is impenetrable.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over their earpieces) Thor is right, we gotta deal with these guys.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: How do we do this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: As a team.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I have unfinished business with Loki.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (readying some arrows) Oh yeah! Get in line.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Save it. Loki’s gonna keep this fight focused on us and that’s what we need. Without him these things could run wild. We got Stark up top, he’s gonna need us to- He stops, seeing Banner arrive on a motorbike. Cap and the others walk over and Banner dismounts, surveying the damage.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: So, this all seems horrible.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve seen worse.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Sorry.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: No, we could- use a little worse.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) Stark, we got him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Cap’s earpiece) Banner?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Just like you said. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Then tell him to suit up. I’m bringing the party to you. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man flies around a corner and towards the group, followed closely by the Leviathan.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (stuttering) I don’t see how that’s a party. Iron Man draws the creature low and it skims the road. Banner turns an begins to walk away, towards the Leviathan.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor Banner, now might be a really good time for you to get angry.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: That’s my secret, Cap. I’m always angry. Banner transforms into the Hulk and punches the Leviathan, smashing it into the ground.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Hold On! Iron Man blasts a missile at the creature and it explodes. Barton ditches. Thor stands taking the blast. Cap shields Natasha. The Chitauri cry out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: Send the rest. The Avengers look up, watching as more Leviathans and hundreds of warriors fly through the portal.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Guys?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Call it, Captain.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Alright, listen up. Until we can close that portal up there, we’re gonna use containment. Barton, I want you on that roof, eyes on everything. Call out patterns and strays. Stark, you got the perimeter. Anything gets more than three blocks out, you turn it back or you turn it to ash.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (to Iron Man) Wanna give me a lift?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Right. Better clench up, Legolas. Iron Man grabs Barton and flies him up to the top of a building, then flies off.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Thor! You gotta try and bottleneck that portal, slow ’em down. You got the lightning, light the bastards up. Thor swings Mjolnir, flying off. CAPTAIN AMERICA (CONT’D) (to Natasha) You and me, we stay here on the ground, keep the fighting here. And Hulk!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir. The council is on. 175

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Stark. You gotta lot of strays on your tail. 176

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Just tryin’ to keep them off the streets. BEGIN INTERCUT: BARTON / INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Well they can’t bank worth a damn. Barton shoots at crafts. He misses, shooting behind his back without looking -- but the arrow hits another craft, causing it to explode.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I will roger that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: END INTERCUT
SPEECH.LINE: Iron Man flies by Hawkeye who fires at the crafts, blowing them up. Iron Man swerves behind two crafts and fires at them. He continues taking a series of quick turns as the Chitauri quickly drop, crash, or follow. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET: TONY (CONT’D) Oh- boy. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man goes flying through a tunnel and turns tightly at the end, sending the last few crafts crashing into a building. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Nice call. What else you got?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (over radio) Well, Thor’s taking out a squadron down on 6th.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And he didn’t invite me! 177

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Captain, none of this is gonna mean a damn thing if we don’t close that portal.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Our biggest guns couldn’t touch it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Well, maybe it’s not about guns.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: You wanna get up there, you’re gonna need a ride. Natasha glances up, seeing the Chitauri crafts fly past. She makes her way over to the other side of the overpass.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I got a ride. I could use a boost though.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: You sure about this? Cap readies his shield in front of him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, it’s gonna be fun! Natasha runs at Rogers, who uses his shield to boost her up. She grabs on to a passing Chitauri vehicle. Cap looks up as she flies off in the distance. He looks to his right and there are more warriors coming. CUTAWAY: NATASHA ON A FLYING CRAFT Natasha climbs aboard the craft, pulls a dagger and stabs a warrior. She spin kicks him off the craft. She makes her way to the other one and uses him to control the vehicle. NATASHA (CONT’D) Turn, turn, Ah! FOLLOWING SHOT: Two crafts come up on Natasha, firing at her. She swerves to avoid them. The crafts are blasted away by Iron Man, who fires away at a fleet behind him. Iron Man takes a turn, coming up on the overpass, where he knocks Chitauri aliens over and lands by Cap, who is fighting and kicking Chitauri. Cap lifts his shield. Iron Man reflects a repulsor blast off the shield, taking out the surrounding warriors. He then flies up the side of a building, hitting more warriors. At the top of which Barton fires into the head of a Chitauri. Two blast are fired at him. He ducks and returns a shot by firing an arrow. The arrow hits the pilot of a craft which falls and gets hit by a Leviathan.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (over earpiece) Captain, the bank on 42nd, past Madison. They cornered a lot of civilians in there.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m on it. Cap walks off. 183

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPTAIN AMERICA
SPEECH.LINE: Everyone clear out! He is then grabbed by a warrior, who he fights and breaks free. A grenade-like device goes off and it blasts Cap out a window and onto a car after his mask is pulled back from his face. He stands silently while police lead the civilians from the building.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (angry) I recognize the council has made a decision, but given that it’s a stupid ass decision, I’ve elected to ignore it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: Director, you’re closer than any of our subs, you scramble that jet- Hill is breathing nervously, panicking, as she listens and watches. FURY (O.S) (angry) That is the island of Manhattan, Councilman.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (angry) Until I’m certain my team can’t hold it, I will not order a nuclear strike against a civilian population.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: If we don’t hold them in the air, we lose everything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I’d send that bird out, we already have. Fury hangs up on them. 185

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Oh you! (into radio) Hawkeye! 186

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Nat, what are you doing? BEGIN INTERCUT: NATASHA / BARTON

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, a little help! Barton nocks an arrow, waiting for Natasha and Loki to come past.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I got it. Barton aims and fires. Loki catches the arrow inches from his face and looks first at it, then at Barton, smirking. The arrow explodes, sending Loki crashing onto the platform at the top of Stark Tower.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: END INTERCUT
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha jumps off the craft. She flips in the air, landing onto... 187

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: ENOUGH! You are, all of you, beneath me! I AM GOD, YOU DULL CREATURE, AND I WILL NOT BE BULLIED BY-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Puny God. Loki whimpers in pain. He has been beaten into submission. 190

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Doctor. She kneels.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Loki’s scepter, the energy- the Tesseract can’t fight. You can’t protect against yourself.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: It’s not your fault. You didn’t know what you were doing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Well, actually I think I did. I built in a safety to cut the power source.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Loki’s scepter.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: It may be able to close the portal. And I’m looking right at it. Selvig looks down to the platform below, where Loki’s scepter lies dropped from when Hulk took him out. 191

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, we will lose power before we penetrate that shell. Iron Man pulls away from the Leviathan. He flies fast. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: JARVIS, you ever hear the tale of Jonah?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: I wouldn’t consider him a role model. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man’s knee plates open, pushing out blades. He is heading directly toward the creature’s mouth. He flies through it. Blowing up the creature’s insides and out the tail end. He crashes to the ground but gets to his feet, only to be shot down again by warriors. 192

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILWOMAN
SPEECH.LINE: (over radio) Director Fury is no longer in command. Override seven-alpha-one-one.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JET PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: Seven-alpha-one-one confirmed. We’re go for takeoff. 195

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: (to Fury) SIR, WE HAVE A BIRD IN MOTION! Fury runs out of the bridge. (into earpiece) Anyone on the deck we have a rogue bird. We need to shut it down! Repeat, takeoff is not authorized! 196

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Stark, you hear me? You have a missile headed straight for the city. 198

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IRON MAN
SPEECH.LINE: How long? INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: (over radio) Three minutes. Max. Stay load can wipe out mid-town.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: JARVIS, put everything we got into the thrusters. BACK TO SCENE:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: I just did. Iron Man blasts away warriors and flies off elsewhere. 199

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JET PILOT
SPEECH.LINE: Package is sent. Detonation in two minutes, thirty seconds. Mark. 200

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You ready for another bout?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: What, you gettin’ sleepy? 202

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SELVIG
SPEECH.LINE: Right at the crown! Natasha begins to push the spear through the barrier surrounding the cube, it’s hard to break.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (into earpiece) I can close it. Can anybody copy? I can shut the portal down! 123. 203

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Do it!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (over Cap’s earpiece) No, wait.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Stark, these things are still coming! INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I got a nuke coming in, it’s gonna blow in less than a minute. 204

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And I know just where to put it. BACK TO SCENE: Iron Man grabs hold of it he begins to redirect it toward the city. INSIDE IRON MAN HELMET:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (over radio) Stark, you know that’s a one way trip.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Save the rest for the turn J.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, shall I try Miss Potts?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: (cutting off) Sorry, Miss-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Come on, Stark. CUTAWAY TO CAP:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Close it. BACK TO SCENE: Natasha plunges the scepter into the heart of the device. Just as the portal closes, Tony falls through back to earth. The Avengers look up and see Tony reappear. ON CAP AND THOR:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Son of a gun! Iron Man plummets to the ground.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: He’s not slowing down. Thor prepares to fly at Stark and catch him when the Hulk grabs him out of the air, slides down the side of a building and crashes to the ground in front of Thor and Cap. Hulk throws Iron Man off him and Thor and Cap run over. Thor pulls off Iron Man’s face plate and Cap listens for a heartbeat, then sees the arc reactor is not glowing. Suddenly the Hulk roars and beats his chest. Tony, shocked, gasps and opens his eyes, looking around.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What the hell? What just happened? Please tell me nobody kissed me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We won.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Alright, Hey. Alright. Good job, guys. Let’s just not come in tomorrow. Let’s just take a day. You ever tried shawarma? There’s a shawarma joint about two blocks from here. I don’t know what it is, but I wanna try it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: We’re not finished yet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And then shawarma after? 212

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: If it’s all the same to you, I’ll have that drink now. 213

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALE REPORTER
SPEECH.LINE: ...devastation of what has been confirmed as an extraterrestrial attack, the extraordinary heroics of the group known as the Avengers-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALE CITIZEN
SPEECH.LINE: It’s really great knowing they’re out there, you know. That someone’s watching over us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE CITIZEN
SPEECH.LINE: I love you, Thor!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HUSBAND
SPEECH.LINE: I just don’t feel safe with those thing out there.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WIFE
SPEECH.LINE: It seems like there’s a lot they’re not telling us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STAN LEE
SPEECH.LINE: Superheroes? In New York? Give me a break!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE SENATOR
SPEECH.LINE: These so called heroes have to be held responsible for the destruction done to the city. This was their fight. Where are they now? 215

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WAITRESS
SPEECH.LINE: Captain America saved my life. Wherever he is, and wherever any of them are, I would just- I would wanna say thank you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not currently tracking their whereabouts. I’d say they’ve earned a leave of absence. COUNCILWOMAN (O.S) And the Tesseract? CUTAWAY TO CENTRAL PARK: Selvig take a glass cylinder out of a truck. Tony opens his case, which is on the ground. Banner holds the Cube with some tongs and puts it into the glass cylinder Selvig has. Over this footage... FURY (V.O) The Tesseract is where belongs...out of our reach. BACK TO SCENE:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: That’s not your call.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I didn’t make it. I just didn’t argue with the god that did. CUT BACK TO CENTRAL PARK: Thor is smiling as he shakes hands and says goodbye to Selvig. COUNCILMAN (V.O) So you let him take it... Loki is bound and gagged in the muzzle, he is mad. As he looks upon Natasha, she whispers something into Barton’s ear that makes him smile. COUNCILMAN (V.O) and the war criminal Loki, who should be answering for his crime. FURY (V.O) Oh I think he will be.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Every world knows it!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNCILMAN
SPEECH.LINE: Was that the point in all this? A statement. CUTAWAY TO STEVE: Steve is riding a motorcycle. He smiles. FURY (V.O) A promise. BACK TO FURY: The council signs off and Fury exits the room. MARIA HILL (V.O) Sir, how does it work now...? 130. 217

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: ...They’ve gone their separate ways, some pretty extremely far. We get into a situation like this again, what happens then?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: They’ll come back! The reach the air deck.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Really sure about that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: I am. Fury looks out over the helicarrier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIA HILL
SPEECH.LINE: Why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FURY
SPEECH.LINE: Because we’ll need them to. Hill nods, in respect. She turns and walks back over the bridge and takes a folder from a SHIELD agent. Fury stands proud on the air deck. 218

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THE OTHER
SPEECH.LINE: The humans, they are not the cowering wretches we were promised. They stand. They are unruly and therefore cannot be ruled. DISEMBODIED FIGURE in a chair stands. The Other bows, like he is in pain. THE OTHER (CONT’D) To challenge them, is to court Death. DISEMBODIED FIGURE turns and smiles, revealing himself to be the mad titan himself- THANOS.
